title: Monster in the Closet
description: Tessa Hanson's always had what she wanted, how she wants it. But when the naked man shows up in her closet and says it's his job to seduce her, can Tessa let go long enough to let him? Magnus isn't cut out for fairy dust and rainbows. He's aiming for better things. But in order to do that, he has to complete just one task. All that stands between him and his career as an incubus is one small seduction...A steamy, light-hearted monster romance with a guaranteed Happy Ever After!
author: Megan Hart
